{"id":785803452,"lang":"python3","time":"3 weeks, 6 days","timestamp":1661720263,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"727 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/785803452/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"18 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def threeSum(self, nums: List[int]) -> List[List[int]]:\n        nums.sort()\n        \n        res=[]\n        \n        for i,val in enumerate(nums):\n            if i>0 and val==nums[i-1]:\n                continue\n            l,r=i+1,len(nums)-1\n            while l<r:\n                threeSum=val+nums[l]+nums[r]\n                if threeSum>0:\n                    r-=1\n                elif threeSum<0:\n                    l+=1\n                else:\n                    res.append([val,nums[l],nums[r]])\n                    l+=1\n                    while nums[l]==nums[l-1] and l<r:\n                        l+=1\n        return res\n            ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum"}
